verses.verse: And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Sanctify <S%H6942><s%> <S%H8761><s%> unto me all the firstborn <S%H1060><s%>, whatsoever openeth <S%H6363><s%> the womb <S%H7358><s%> among the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, both of man <S%H120><s%> and of beast <S%H929><s%>: it is mine.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%>, Remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8800><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, in which ye came out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of bondage <S%H5650><s%>; for by strength <S%H2392><s%> of hand <S%H3027><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> brought you out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8689><s%> from this place: there shall no leavened bread <S%H2557><s%> be eaten <S%H398><s%> <S%H8735><s%>.
This day <S%H3117><s%> came ye out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in the month <S%H2320><s%> Abib <S%H24><s%>.

And it shall be when the YY <S%H3068><s%> shall bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thee into the land <S%H776><s%> of the Kanahanites <S%H3669><s%>, and the Hittites <S%H2850><s%>, and the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, and the Hivites <S%H2340><s%>, and the Y'vusis <S%H2983><s%>, which he sware <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8738><s%> unto thy fathers <S%H1><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> thee, a land <S%H776><s%> flowing <S%H2100><s%> <S%H8802><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%>, that thou shalt keep <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8804><s%> this service <S%H5656><s%> in this month <S%H2320><s%>.

Seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> thou shalt eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> matzah <S%H4682><s%>, and in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall be a feast <S%H2282><s%> to the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

Unleavened bread <S%H4682><s%> shall be eaten <S%H398><s%> <S%H8735><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>; and there shall no leavened bread <S%H2557><s%> be seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8735><s%> with thee, neither shall there be leaven <S%H7603><s%> seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8735><s%> with thee in all thy quarters <S%H1366><s%>.

And thou shalt shew <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8689><s%> thy son <S%H1121><s%> in that day <S%H3117><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, This is done because of <S%H5668><s%> that <S%H2088><s%> which the YY <S%H3068><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto me when I came forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8800><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And it shall be for a sign <S%H226><s%> unto thee upon thine hand <S%H3027><s%>, and for a memorial <S%H2146><s%> between thine eyes <S%H5869><s%>, that the YY'S <S%H3068><s%> Torah <S%H8451><s%> may be in thy mouth <S%H6310><s%>: for with a strong <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> hath the YY <S%H3068><s%> brought thee out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8689><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.
Thou shalt therefore keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8804><s%> this ordinance <S%H2708><s%> in his season <S%H4150><s%> from year <S%H3117><s%> to year <S%H3117><s%>.

And it shall be when the YY <S%H3068><s%> shall bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thee into the land <S%H776><s%> of the Kanahanites <S%H3669><s%>, as he sware <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8738><s%> unto thee and to thy fathers <S%H1><s%>, and shall give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it thee,

That thou shalt set apart <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8689><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> all that openeth <S%H6363><s%> the matrix <S%H7358><s%>, and every firstling <S%H6363><s%> that cometh <S%H7698><s%> of a beast <S%H929><s%> which thou hast; the males <S%H2145><s%> shall be the YY'S <S%H3068><s%>.

And every firstling <S%H6363><s%> of an ass <S%H2543><s%> thou shalt redeem <S%H6299><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with a lamb <S%H7716><s%>; and if thou wilt not redeem <S%H6299><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it, then thou shalt break his neck <S%H6202><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: and all the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> among thy children <S%H1121><s%> shalt thou redeem <S%H6299><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And it shall be when thy son <S%H1121><s%> asketh <S%H7592><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee in time to come <S%H4279><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, What is this? that thou shalt say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto him, By strength <S%H2392><s%> of hand <S%H3027><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> brought us out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8689><s%> from Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, from the house <S%H1004><s%> of bondage <S%H5650><s%>:

And it came to pass, when Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> would hardly <S%H7185><s%> <S%H8689><s%> let us go <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8763><s%>, that the YY <S%H3068><s%> slew <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8799><s%> all the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, both the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, and the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of beast <S%H929><s%>: therefore I sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to the YY <S%H3068><s%> all that openeth <S%H6363><s%> the matrix <S%H7358><s%>, being males <S%H2145><s%>; but all the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of my children <S%H1121><s%> I redeem <S%H6299><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And it shall be for a token <S%H226><s%> upon thine hand <S%H3027><s%>, and for frontlets <S%H2903><s%> between thine eyes <S%H5869><s%>: for by strength <S%H2392><s%> of hand <S%H3027><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> brought us forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8689><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And it came to pass, when Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> had let the people <S%H5971><s%> go <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8763><s%>, that 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> led <S%H5148><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them not through the way <S%H1870><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>, although <S%H3588><s%> that was near <S%H7138><s%>; for 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Lest peradventure the people <S%H5971><s%> repent <S%H5162><s%> <S%H8735><s%> when they see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8800><s%> war <S%H4421><s%>, and they return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to Egypt <S%H4714><s%>:

But 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> led <S%H5437><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> about <S%H5437><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, through the way <S%H1870><s%> of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%>: and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8804><s%> harnessed <S%H2571><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the bones <S%H6106><s%> of Yosef <S%H3130><s%> with him: for he had straitly <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8687><s%> sworn <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> will surely <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8800><s%> visit <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8799><s%> you; and ye shall carry up <S%H5927><s%> my bones <S%H6106><s%> away <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8689><s%> hence with you.

And they took their journey <S%H5265><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from Sukkot <S%H5523><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in Etham <S%H864><s%>, in the edge <S%H7097><s%> of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them by day <S%H3119><s%> in a pillar <S%H5982><s%> of a cloud <S%H6051><s%>, to lead <S%H5148><s%> <S%H8687><s%> them the way <S%H1870><s%>; and by night <S%H3915><s%> in a pillar <S%H5982><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%>, to give them light <S%H215><s%> <S%H8687><s%>; to go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8800><s%> by day <S%H3119><s%> and night <S%H3915><s%>:

He took not away <S%H4185><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the pillar <S%H5982><s%> of the cloud <S%H6051><s%> by day <S%H3119><s%>, nor the pillar <S%H5982><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> by night <S%H3915><s%>, from before <S%H6440><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>.
